summary:
Postal reform and legal/regulatory framework postal sector

Key issues:
* Strategic planning and business development postal services
* Organization Development and business units 
* Institutional strenghtening postal sector
* Market Reviews postal sector
* Postal sector policy and regulations
* Set up legal and Regulatory Framework
* Postal sector laws and review of sector developments 
Specialties: HRM and Change Management
